plot: Tsubasa is a young boy who dreams of becoming a Shinki master. Shinki are small robot girls which can talk, fight, and fly. On a full moon night, Tsubasa finds a damaged Shinki model and takes it home. After repairing it, he gives her the name of Kaguya. They live a happy life until the former owner of Kaguya finds her.
opening_theme: "Catalysis of the Mind" (孤高のカタルシス; Kokou no Katarushisu) by Nana Mitani
ending_theme: "Kayowaki Juujika no Ai" (か弱き十字架の愛) by Kei
